settings.title: Attach. Connect. Find.
settings.subtitle: Filo is here to help you find the things you never want to lose or forget.

settings.title: Attach Filo
settings.text: Simply attach Filo to the valuables you don’t want to lose or forget.

settings.title: Locate Filo by making it ring
settings.text: Connect Filo to the app on your phone and you'll be able to ring your items from your phone when you get close.

settings.title: View the last seen position
settings.text: Can't remember where you left your keys? Check the app to view where you last had them.

settings.title: Find your smartphone
settings.text: Press the button on your Filo and if your lost phone is within Bluetooth range, it will ring loudly, even if it's in silent mode.

settings.title: Find your things easily with Filo
settings.subtitle: Filo is a small device that helps you find your valuables, with the help of a user-friendly app.

settings.title: Key Finder
settings.text:
Attach Filo to your keys and connect it to the Filo app on your phone.
Now, you'll be able to ring your keys directly.

settings.title: Phone Finder
settings.text: Just press the button on Filo and if your lost phone is within Bluetooth range it will ring loudly even if it's in silent mode.

settings.title: Wallet Finder
settings.text: Put Filo in your wallet and use the Filo app to locate it by making it ring or checking to see where you left it behind on the map.

settings.title: Parking Finder
settings.text: Leave Filo in your car and the Filo app will automatically save the last seen position, reminding you where you parked.

settings.title: Alternating content
settings.text: Employ up to three alternating features with an option to use an image or video and include a call to action button.

settings.title: Help & Support
settings.text:
Do you need any assistance?
We are here to help you.

settings.title: Promotional & Bulk Orders
settings.text:
Interested in personalising or distributing Filo?
Let’s get in touch.

settings.title: Press & Media
settings.text:
Looking to write an aritcle or make a video?
Our Press material is available for you in order to find all you need about us.

settings.title: Privacy DPO
settings.text: Interest in Privacy? Contact our DPO: Francesco Paolucci

settings.title: 1. Attach Filo  to your valuables
settings.text: Attach Filo to anything you don’t want to lose and connect it to the Filo app.

settings.title: 2. Ring your Filo
settings.text: Make your Filo ring, to retrieve your lost items in seconds.

settings.title: 3. Find your smartphone
settings.text:
Have you ever left your smartphone behind? Filo works both ways!
Just press the button on your Filo to make your smartphone ring,
even if it's in silent mode!

settings.title: 4. Check the last seen position
settings.text:
Is your Filo out of Bluetooth range?
Find your missing valuables by checking their last registered position.
The app remembers when and where you last had them.

settings.title: Slideshow
settings.subtitle: Introduce customers to your shop with lifestyle imagery and product photography.

settings.title: Press Kit
settings.text: Filo is not just a little device, it is a incredibly smart way to find your things. Simply attach this cool Bluetooth tracker to your valuables and find it with our user-friendly Filo app. You can also use Filo to find your phone. By downloading our press kit you will find a more information including a product presentation, product images, and logos.

settings.title: Press Kit & Media Inquiry
settings.text: If you’d like to post a story, news article or blog about Filo, please contact us here and we’ll provide you with all the necessary information that you may need.

settings.title: Attach it to your valuables
settings.text: Attach Filo to the items that you don't want to lose.

settings.title: Make it ring
settings.text: When using the app you can make Filo ring, helping you find it, along with your items, in seconds.

settings.title: Last seen
settings.text: Can't remember where you left your keys? Check the app to view where you last left them.

settings.title: Find your smartphone
settings.text: Find your phone in seconds! Make it ring by pressing the button on your Filo device, even if it's in silent mode.

settings.title: How Filo works
settings.subtitle: Join Filo & Discover all the functionality

settings.title: Simple Setup
settings.text: The app takes seconds to download to your phone or tablet, and walks you through every step of activating your Filo.

settings.title: Replaceable Battery
settings.text: The battery is inexpensive, easily replaceable, and lasts up to 10 months.

settings.title: Specifications
settings.text:
Connection: Bluetooth LE 4.0
Battery Type: CR2016 
Dimensions: 38 x 38 x 6 mm

settings.title: Compatiblity
settings.text:
Compatible with:
iOS: 4s or later, iPad Mini, iPad 3° gen or later
Android: v 4.4 or later
Visit www.filotrack.com/android
for the complete list of compatible models.

settings.title: Lost Keys Finder.
settings.text: With Tile Mate small key tracker, you can find your keys fast. Just listen for the ring - using your phone with Tile’s key finder app you can locate your keys in seconds.

settings.title: Choose color and quantity!
settings.text: Display a full width feature that can contain a large image, or video, and an optional call to action button.

settings.title: SMART
settings.text: Filo is not just a gift, it is a incredibly smart way to find things in the everyday life.

settings.title: DESIGN
settings.text:
Attention to detail, quality
and its sleek design make Filo
a unique gift.

settings.title: 100% MADE IN ITALY
settings.text: The quality of materials and the meticulous attention to details, make Filo, sophisticated device with an authentic and innovative soul

settings.title: Be Smart. Choose Filo.
settings.subtitle:
Over 300 companies have already chosen Filo for their events,
fairs and Christmas gifts. With Filo your customers and partners
will always have your brand at their fingertips!

settings.title: Work with us. You will love it.
settings.subtitle:
We are a small team made of passionate peoplewho love what they do, surrounded by naturein the villas of Pi Campus, Rome.
We are always looking for talented peopleto join our small team.

settings.title: A COMMITTED TEAM
settings.text: We all focus on the same goal. Fail, learn, reach your goal: your win is our win.

settings.title: AMAZING LOCATION
settings.text: Our office is based in Rome, in the greenest area of EUR, in a villa which is part of the bustling eniviroment at PI Campus.

settings.title: PROFESSIONAL GROWTH
settings.text: Learn something new every day. We invest in your growth to keep pushing through together.

settings.title: NOT JUST WORK
settings.text: We start work everyday with a smile. Even if we are hardworkers, we definitively know how to relax, spending time spinning or playing foosball.

settings.title:
Filo is a smart Company
in the IoT business.
settings.subtitle: Filo S.r.l is an innovative startup founded in September, 2014. Thanks to a seed by LVenture Group, Filo joined Luiss Enlabs' acceleration program in Rome. Today, Filo is sold online and available to italian retailers. Many companies have already chosen Filo as a customised, smart and innovative corporate gift. In addition, in order to meet companys' needs, Filo's technology can be embedded into other products to create the best possible solution. Filo's R&D Dept. is engaged not only in tech merging, but is also deeply focused in exploring upcoming tracking technology which will surpass present Bluetooth range. Filo has been listed among the 100 best startups of 2015 by StartUpItalia and has been exhibited at Las Vegas' CES at the Qualcomm stand, as one of their best cases.

settings.title:
Il gadget aziendale che
ti aiuta a ritrovare le chiavi.
Personalizzalo con il tuo logo.
settings.text:
Filo è un piccolo dispositivo che aiutai tuoi clienti, partner o dipendentia ritrovare i loro oggetti più importanti tramite un’app.
Filo è utile, innovativo e 100% made in Italy

Attaccalo ai tuoi oggetti

Attacca Filo a tutte quelle cose che non vuoi perdere o dimenticare.

Fallo suonare

Fai suonare Filo dall'app e ritrova le tue cose in pochi secondi.

Ritrova lo smartphone

Premi il pulsante di Filo e fai suonare lo smartphone anche se in modalità silenzioso.

Ultima posizione

Controlla nell’app l’ultima posizione dei tuoi oggetti e visualizza dove li hai dimenticati.

che ti aiuta a ritrovare gli oggetti tramite un’app.

che i tuoi clienti, partner e dipendenti ameranno

settings.title: Scegli un’idea regalo da uomoche non potrà dimenticare.
settings.subtitle:
Filo è un dispositivo che aiuta a ritrovare gli oggettiche perde o dimentica più spesso, tramite un’app.
É un’idea regalo da uomo utile e originale.
Regalalo e grazie a Filo potrà sempre ritrovare le sue cose.

settings.title: Setup
settings.text: Scarica l'app per iOS e Android, segui le semplici istruzioni e attiva il tuo Filo immediatamente!

settings.title: Batteria
settings.text: La batteria dura fino a 10 mesi, è sostituibile e costa meno di €1

settings.title: Specifiche tecniche
settings.text:
Connection: bluetooth LE 4.0
Battery Type: CR2016 
Dimensions: 38 x 38 x 6 mm

settings.title: Compatibilità
settings.text:
Compatibile con:
iOS: 4s o successive, iPad Mini, iPad 3° gen o successivi
Android: v 4.4 o successivi
Visita www.filotrack.com/android
per la lista completa dei modelli compatibili.

settings.title: Trova le chiavi
settings.text:
Attacca Filo alle tue chiavi e collegalo all'App.
Da adesso, potrai far suonare Filo per trovarle in pochi secondi.

settings.title: Trova il tuo smartphone, anche se silenzioso.
settings.text: Basta premere il bottone di Filo, e se il tuo smartphone è nel raggio Bluetooth suonerà, persino se è in modalità silenziosa.

settings.title: Trova il portafoglio
settings.text: Inserisci Filo nel tuo portafoglio. Ora puoi ritrovarlo facendo suonare Filo, o visualizzare nella mappa dell'app dove lo hai dimenticato.

settings.title: Ricorda dove hai parcheggiato la macchina
settings.text: Inserisci Filo nella tua auto e l'app memorizzerà automaticamente dove l'hai parcheggiata.

settings.title: Alessio
settings.text:
Regalo inaspettato!
Si è rivelato molto utile sia quando scordi dove hai lasciato il telefono, sia se non ricordi dove hai parcheggiato l’auto!
Piccolo, design interessante e trendy.
Nel complesso bellissima idea regalo per Natale.

settings.title: Alessandra
settings.text:
Fantastico!!!
Ho regalato Filo per Natale al mio migliore amico che perde sempre le chiavi di casa ed ancora mi ringrazia!!
Grandi!

settings.text:
Make your Filo ring
Make your Filo ring to help find the things you've lost, in seconds.

Find Your Smartphone
Did you forget your smartphone? Press the button on your Filo to make your phone ring, even if it's in silent mode!

Last seen
Is your Filo out of Bluetooth range?
Find the things you've lost by checking the last registered position. The app remembers where and when you last had them with you.

Comfort Zone
Activate the Comfort Zone and receive notifications on your smartphone if you are about to leave your objects behind, so that you don't forget them.

settings.title: Keep safewho you love most
settings.custom_html:
Tata is the smart anti-abandonement pad.Place it on your child's car-seat and do not worry anymore.
Subscribe and be the first to know when we will be taking orders for Tata!

settings.text:
Warning: baby on board!
Tata warns you
if your child is still in the car.

Place Tata on the car-seat and connect it to the app on your smartphone.

Using its sensors, Tata can understand if the baby is still on board and warns you, through the app, if you unintentionally walk away from him.

Place Tata on your child car-seat, and forget about it.
Tata will warn you in case of need.

1. Ringing alarm
In case of accidental abandonment, if your baby is in the car, Tata app will send a loud alarm on you smartphone, lasting 60 seconds.
2. Emergency call and SMS
If you do not snooze the alarm within 60 seconds, Tata app will send an SMS and an emergency call to 5 preselected contacts, with the GPS position of the car.

Easy and fast setup

Installing Tata is very easy: put it on your child car-seat, download the app and connect Tata to the smartphone.

Long-lasting, replaceable battery

Tata works with two common batteries (AAA). After 1 year you can simply replace them.

Compatible with every child car-seat

Tata is compatible with any car-seat,
it is designed to fit any model.

Smart

Tata is so smart that you do not even need to turn it on. It will be active while your baby is on board.

settings.custom_html:
Even a short commute counts.
Keep safe who you love most.
Get an invite and be the first to purchase Tata!

settings.title: Amazon Gift Card
settings.custom_html:
You will receive a €25 Amazon Gift Card for your Christmas shopping!

The gift card will be sent to your email within 7 working days.

settings.title: The tiny smart key finder
settings.text: Find your keys by attaching the Filo Bluetooth key finder to your keys and find them with the Filo app on your phone by simply ringing them. Spend less time looking and more finding your keys thanks to Filo Bluetooth tracker.

settings.title: Where's my phone?
settings.text: Use Filo's phone finder feature to keep your phone always with you. With a press of a button reunite with your phone. Filo is the perfect bluetooth tracker to help you find your keys, phone and personal belongings that you can't leave behind.

1. Attach

Attach Filo to anything you don't want to lose. Connect it with the Free Filo App.

2. Ring

Ring Filo by pressing the in app button or double press Filo's button to ring your phone, even in silence mode.

3. Find

Find your missing belongings. Filo's app remembers when and where you last left them.
made in Italy
free shipping in Italy
2 years warranty

settings.title: Luggage trackers help to identify and keep your luggage always with you
settings.text:
Drop Filo into your luggage and use the luggage tracker app to ring your luggage and quickly identify and find it.
Filo is based on low energy bluetooth technology, made for short distance tracking

Making your travels less stressful, Filo keeps your things safe where ever you go.

settings.title: The handy bluetooth wallet tracker
settings.text:
Drop Filo into your wallet and use Filo's wallet tracker app to find your wallet by sound or last know position based on low energy bluetooth technology.

The days looking endlessly for your wallet are gone thanks to Filo.

settings.title: Find fast everything that matters with Filo
settings.text: Don't lose sight of your belongings with the free Filo app and Filo's Bluetooth tracker. Filo is simply there when you most need it. Let Filo remind you before you leave behind your personal belongings where ever you go.
